articles.title: Kim Petras becomes first out trans artist to hit No. 1 on Billboard Hot 100 with 'Unholy' - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: Petras' collaboration with Sam Smith broke a record for trans and non-binary representation in music, as Smith is now the first publicly non-binary artist to reach No. 1.
articles.content:
Kim Petras has blazed a new trail for trans women in the music industry.

articles.title: MrBeast beats Dwayne Johnson at $100,000 rock, paper, scissors game - Insider
articles.description: Dwayne Johnson promised to give $100,000 to the Make-A-Wish Foundation after losing a game of rock, paper, scissors to YouTube star MrBeast.
articles.content:
America's biggest YouTuber MrBeast challenged Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson to a game of rock, paper, scissors, with a penalty of donating $100,000 to charity for the person who lost.
